info.name: Youtube Vibra for New YouTube (Light and Dark)
info.description:
BEFORE YOU RATE Installing etc. is the function of the plugin, if you have a problem with the design, that's my area. Negative posts that are actually the plugin's fault are hurting this style's rating, I hope you can understand.

INTRODUCTION

Youtube Vibra is a vivid and vivacious userstyle for Youtube.com that tries to reimagine the experience of going on YouTube.
It also supports a plethora of plugins including VidIQ, SocialBlade and Iridium.
If you do install the userstyle, thank you!

SCREENSHOTS

Updated: 1/6/18 I apologise that I didn't upload them to this website but I thought high-res images are important
  • Light
  • Dark
To change the color of the gradient, press the "Additional Style Settings" button below. Values given in the Release box.
info.additionalInfo:
GRADIENT COLORS

You can suggest new colors down below!
  • Peach Sunset (#ff6a3e, #fe3d90)
  • Cool Summer (#134e5e, #71b280)
  • Vibrantions (#7f00ff, #e100ff)
  • Galaxy (#753a88, #cc2b5e)
  • Environmental Blue (#00c9ff, #92fe9d)
  • Royal Purple (#42275a, #734b6d)
  • Rose (#FFAFBD, #ffc3a0)
  • Blue Planet (#24c6dc, #514a9d)
  • Summer Sun (#ffee00, #ff8e1c)
  • Blur (#5c258d, #4389a2)
  • Peach Sunset (#ffca94, #ff8fb8)
  • Ocean Green (#007fff, #83e27a)
  • Lavender Town (#e6c1f6, #d3beea)

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

  • Install the 'Stylish' Plugin to your browser
  • To change the color of the gradient, press the "Additional Style Settings" button
  • Click the 'Install Style' button
  • Make sure that you're using the new Youtube

CHANGELOG

Version 1.1.3:
  • Fixed the color of icons and texts
  • Fixed some problems with dark mode
    • Added 3 new gradients - a new Peach Sunset, Ocean Green, Lavender Town
Version 1.1.2: Another Incremental Update
  • Fixed the HD/4K logo
  • Fixed some bugs
    • Added 2 new gradients - Summer Sun and Blur (one of my favorites)
Version 1.1.1: Incremental Update
  • Made the video player more round-y
    • Added Blue Planet
Version 1.1: Happy New Year Everyone
  • Added 2 new gradients - Rose, Royal Purple (what can I say, I love purple gradients)
  • Socialblade tags are finally visible in dark mode (sorry about that)
  • Fixed a lot of issues with the dark mode
  • and much more! (code for I forgot what else I did)
Version 1:
  • Added 4 new gradients - Galaxy, Cool Summer, Vibrantions and Environmental Blue (because the blue is going green!!)
  • Redesigned the SocialBlade plugin's colors to support the new gradients
  • Redesigned the VidIQ plugins to fix its issues/li>
  • New logo for the SocialBlade plugin (yay!!)
  • Updated the YouTube logo to a higher resolution
  • Changed the search icon's color so it's not invisible in light mode
  • Change the link color
  • Added support to switches and such
  • The progress bar is gradient colored now
  • Uhhhh I forgot
Beta 1
  • Added support for Mozilla Firefox
Alpha 1.01:
  • A very incremental update, just replaced the verified badge to a better looking custom made icon that is uniform in both dark and light themes
Alpha 1:
  • Redesigned Multiple Buttons
  • Recoloured multiple elements
  • Redesigned the plugins
  • Recoloured and replaced a multitude of vectors
  • and Much more

data.title: Love it but has one minor issue
Been using it for months, please add '#007fff, #83e27a' - my favourite right now. Maybe "Green Ocean
could you add #E4CCFF, #EDDEFD or something like light purple/lavender?
can you add #9FAEC7, #B89FC7, maybe make it called "Bath Bomb"
